#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000009
#define MAXN 100005
#define pi 3.14159
#define D 1009
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 
int z[1000006];
int cnt[1000006];
string s;

void z_algo(){
	for(int i=1,l=0,r=0;i<s.length();i++){
		if(i<=r)
		z[i]=min(r-i+1,z[i-l]);
		while(i+z[i]<s.length()&&(s[z[i]]==s[i+z[i]]))
		++z[i];
		if(i+z[i]-1>r){
			l=i;
			r=i+z[i]-1;
		}
	}
}

int main(){
	int n,k,i;
	cin>>n;
	cin>>s;
	cin>>k;
	z_algo();
	z[0]=n;
	for(i=0;i<=n;i++){
		cnt[z[i]]++;
	}
	int cur=0;
	for(i=n;i>=0;i--){
		cur+=cnt[i];
		if(cur>=k)
		break;
	}
	cout<<i<<endl;
	for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
	cout<<s[j];
	return 0;
}
